availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Carroll County, Kentucky, laborer. Trimble County, Kentucky, native. Son of Jeremiah Luckett and Elizabeth Finnie Luckett. Married Elizabeth Falkner in Carroll County on January 23, 1853. Married Aletha G. Ball in Carroll County on September 30, 1857. Laborer in Carroll County in 1850.

bibl.p:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District 2, p. 412. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Locust Precinct, p. 25. "Kentucky Marriages, 1785-1979," database, FamilySearch57
(https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:F471-M5V : 4 December 2014), Robert S. Luckett and Elizabeth Falkner, 23 Jan 1853; citing , Carroll, Kentucky, reference 2:1Q8VGZC; FHL microfilm 216,819. "Kentucky Marriages, 1785-1979," database, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:F4WM-BJW : 4 December 2014), Robert S. Luckett and Aletha G. Ball, 30 Sep 1857; citing , Carroll, Kentucky, reference 2:1Q8VLZ2; FHL microfilm 216,819.
